name: sky caves
description:
You know when a hamster runs in a wheel? This game is like that, except the entire level is the wheel. Enjoy wall jumping through the sky caves, collecting gems and avoiding the yellow spikes! See how you can navigate through the level while your movement affects the you and the level. hehehe.

Cave Assets from Ansimuz: https://ansimuz.itch.io/ 
Sky from PauR: https://opengameart.org/content/sky-background
Castle Assets from rubberduck: https://opengameart.org/users/rubberduck
Soundtrack from Jesse Klein: https://justaphaze.com/
Sound FX from Swiss Arcade Game Entertainment: https://phoenix1291.itch.io/sound-effects-pack-2
